caption: there are two vases that are sitting side by side
description: There are two vases placed side by side on a wooden table, one with a red ceramic handle and the other featuring a blue glass body, their surfaces matching the color of the surrounding furniture. The vases are arranged in a straight line, creating a visually balanced composition. One vase contains a cup filled with water, while the other holds a small glass jar of juice, demonstrating distinct functional elements. The arrangement is clear, with no overlapping or confusing details, maintaining a straightforward and accurate depiction of the scene.
